titleStmt.title: The right honourable the Lord Kimbolton his speech in Parliament, Ian. 3. 1641: concerning the articles of high treason exhibited against him, Mr. Pym, Mr. Hambden, Mr. Hollis, Sir Arthur Haslerigge knight, and Mr. Strowde. By the Kings Majestie.
Speech in Parliament, Jan. 3. 1641.
titleStmt.author: Manchester, Edward Montagu, Earl of, 1602-1671.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
